channel.title: Comments on: The Top Fifty Environmental Blogs – Well we are getting there

item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description: welcome shawana, i support gentle and light hearted approaches to both gardening and sexuality. i believe that we need both to change our attitude towards mother earth. i was trying to be ironic about the way people construct "lists of the best" environmental blogs in the same way that i have approached "lists of energy savings tips". i hope i did not offend, such was not my intent. i hope to hear more from you here in the future.
item.content:encoded: welcome shawana, i support gentle and light hearted approaches to both gardening and sexuality. i believe that we need both to change our attitude towards mother earth. i was trying to be ironic about the way people construct “lists of the best” environmental blogs in the same way that i have approached “lists of energy savings tips”. i hope i did not offend, such was not my intent. i hope to hear more from you here in the future.

item.title: By: shawna88
item.dc:creator: shawna88
item.description:
Hi!
In response to your most recent blog.
I am indeed a greening and environmental expert – simply creatively marketed. www.gardeningnude.com is a website which provides green tips and ideas for simple living and green lifestyle living. The title is based on the green living book I wrote with the same title.
Would love to learn more about you and how you are educating on environmentalism and sustainability.
Best wishes,
Shawna Coronado
Get Healthy! Get Green! Get Community! www.thecasualgardener.com
The Blogs - http://www.thecasualgardener.com/Theblogs.html
item.content:encoded:
Hi!

In response to your most recent blog.

I am indeed a greening and environmental expert – simply creatively marketed. http://www.gardeningnude.com/ is a website which provides green tips and ideas for simple living and green lifestyle living. The title is based on the green living book I wrote with the same title.

Would love to learn more about you and how you are educating on environmentalism and sustainability.

Best wishes,

Shawna Coronado

Get Healthy! Get Green! Get Community!
http://www.thecasualgardener.com/

The Blogs – http://www.thecasualgardener.com/Theblogs.html
